title: InterDynamics Car Air Conditioner Refrigerant Gauge and Hose, EZ Chill Reusable AC Recharge Kit for Cars, Trucks
features: Gauge displays pressure reading for accurate fill
90 degree coupler for ports in tight positions
Compatible with both sealed and self-sealing R-134a cans.
description: EZ Chill Reusable R-134a Gauge and Hose features an in-line gauge, easy-to-use thumb lever dispenser, and ninety degree coupler. The gauge is able to diagnose if a recharge is needed, identify the current low-side pressure in the system, and determine increases in pressure during the recharge process. This product is compatible with both sealed and self-sealing R-134a cans.
